formalpara.title: Interner Hilfetext zu dieser Applikation in Asterisk 1.2:

para.screen:
-= Info about application 'ResponseTimeout' =-
[Synopsis] Set maximum timeout awaiting response
[Description] ResponseTimeout(seconds): This will set the maximum amount of time permitted to wait for an extension to dialed (see the WaitExten application), before the timeout occurs. If this timeout is reached, dialplan execution will continue at the 't' extension, if it exists. ResponseTimeout has been deprecated in favor of Set(TIMEOUT(response)=timeout)

formalpara.title: Differenz des internen Hilfetexts von Asterisk 1.2 zu 1.4:
